title: Avocado Toast
desc: Whole-grain toast topped with mashed avocado, lemon and chili flakes.
steps: Toast the bread to desired crispiness.
Mash avocado with lemon juice, salt and pepper.
Spread mixture onto toast and sprinkle chili flakes.

title: Overnight Oats
desc: Creamy overnight oats with milk, chia and mixed berries.
steps: Mix oats, chia and milk in a jar.
Refrigerate overnight.
Top with berries and honey before serving.

title: Grilled Salmon & Veggies
desc: Omega-3 rich salmon with herb-roasted vegetables.
steps: Season salmon and grill 4–6 minutes per side until cooked.
Roast seasoned vegetables in oven at 200°C for 20 minutes.
Serve salmon atop roasted vegetables with lemon.

title: Quinoa-Stuffed Peppers
desc: Bell peppers stuffed with quinoa, beans and herbs.
steps: Mix quinoa, beans and vegetables; season.
Stuff mixture into peppers and bake 20–25 minutes.
Top with cheese if using and bake 5 more minutes.

title: Zucchini Noodle Carbonara (light)
desc: Lower-carb twist on carbonara using zucchini noodles.
steps: Sauté pancetta or mushrooms; set aside.
Quickly sauté zoodles then combine with egg and cheese off heat.
Toss with cooked pancetta and season.

title: Greek Yogurt Parfait
desc: Layered Greek yogurt with honey, nuts and fresh fruit.
steps: Layer yogurt, berries and granola in a glass.
Drizzle honey and sprinkle nuts on top.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry with Tofu
desc: Quick wok-fried veggies with crispy tofu and light soy sauce.
ingredients: Garlic, ginger, soy sauce, sesame oil
steps: Pan-fry tofu until golden; set aside.
Stir-fry vegetables with garlic and ginger.
Return tofu to pan, add soy sauce and toss to combine.

title: Grilled Chicken Grain Bowl
desc: High-protein bowl with grilled chicken, brown rice, roasted vegetables, and a light herb dressing.
ingredients: Herb dressing (1 tsp olive oil, lemon juice, parsley, salt, pepper)
steps: Cook the brown rice as per instructions.
Grill the chicken breast until fully cooked and juicy.
Roast the vegetables until tender.
Assemble the bowl with rice, chicken, roasted veggies, and greens.
Drizzle with herb dressing and serve.

title: Berry & Spinach Smoothie
desc: Vitamin-rich smoothie: berries, spinach, banana and almond milk.
steps: Add all ingredients to blender and blend until smooth.
Pour into a glass and enjoy immediately.

title: Oven-Roasted Chicken & Veg
desc: Simple one-tray roast with herbs for an easy weeknight meal.
steps: Toss chicken and vegetables in oil and herbs.
Roast at 200°C for 30–40 minutes until cooked through.
Rest 5 minutes then serve.

title: Hummus & Veggie Plate
desc: Creamy hummus served with raw veggie sticks and whole-grain crackers.
steps: Arrange hummus in bowl and plate veggies around.
Serve with crackers for dipping.

title: Banana Oat Energy Balls
desc: No-bake energy bites with oats, dates and nuts — great pre-workout snack.
steps: Blend dates and peanut butter until smooth, mix with oats and chia.
Roll into balls and chill until firm.
